term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - isoionic point in electrophoresis
term.title: isoionic point

item.text: The pH value at which the net electric charge of an elementary entity in pure water equals zero.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 891. 'Quantities and units for electrophoresis in the clinical laboratory (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 895 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466040891)
